DOC.brief_summary: Researchers John Wayne Cancer Institute ( JWCI ) Providence Saint John 's Health Center ( PSJHC ) try examine whether acupuncture reduces joint pain patient treat aromatase inhibitor ( AI ) therapy breast cancer whether reduction pain happen lower inflammation .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Acupuncture Aromatase Inhibitor-Induced Joint Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose investigate effect acupuncture patient experience joint pain aromatase inhibitor therapy . The investigator serially measure patient 's symptom track current medication , joint pain , daily activity , fatigue , quality life . The investigator collect peripheral blood baseline , week 4 7 , one week last acupuncture treatment 4 week last acupuncture treatment . The investigator study sample collect five predetermined time-points test immune parameter , innate adaptive immune response , well proliferative capability pro-inflammatory mediator reflect innate adaptive functional immune response .
DOC.criteria: Female Must aromatase inhibitor therapy continuously breast cancer treatment least precede two month Must experience increase new onset joint pain daily degree equal great 4 pain scale 010 start aromatase inhibitor therapy Able read write English Able give write informed consent participate study Have know autoimmune disease acute infection Have acupuncture treatment within 6 month study enrollment Known needle phobia Known metal allergy Have implantable device , pacemaker , defibrillator device contraindicate electrical stimulation Use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) narcotic within 7 day study enrollment study period ( 15 week ) Receipt prior chemotherapy , immunotherapy radiation therapy within 90 day On anticoagulant therapy Receiving physical occupational therapy concurrently Taking herb herbal tea within 7 day study enrollment study period ( 15 week ) Have immunecompromising medical condition currently receive immunemodulating therapy ( include corticosteroid ) Enrolled active cancer treatment protocols Bone fracture surgery affect extremity within 6 month
